article_title: Dr Jart Water Drop Hydrating Moisturizer Launch Review
article_text:
Skin care

An Editor-Approved At-Home Teeth Whitener

A year or two ago, I started noticing everyone’s teeth — and let me tell you, they were white. Out of nowhere, I would get taken aback by a sparkling set of ivory incisors I spotted on the street or find myself gawking at a coworker's perfect pearly whites during a meeting. It’s sounds weird (and a bit creepy), I ...

Megan Cahn

article_metadata.description: Dr. Jart just launched the coolest new moisturizer.
